        Returns:

      • isPostUpgradeNeeded

        boolean isPostUpgradeNeeded()
        Returns:
        true if post upgrade is required

      • getLastUpgradedToVersion

        String getLastUpgradedToVersion()
        Returns:
        EJBCA version of the database content that can be upgraded while running older EJBCAs on the same database.

      • getLastPostUpgradedToVersion

        String getLastPostUpgradedToVersion()
        Returns:
        EJBCA version of the database content that can be upgraded after all nodes run the same EJBCA version.

      • getPostUpgradeStarted

        long getPostUpgradeStarted()
        Returns:
        the epoch time of when the post-upgrade was last started in the cluster

      • isEndEntityProfileInCertificateData

        boolean isEndEntityProfileInCertificateData()
        Returns:
        true if the endEntityProfileId column in CertificateData has been populated.

      • checkColumnExists500

        boolean checkColumnExists500()
        Returns:
        true if the AdminGroupData.cAId column still exists which indicates that this is EJBCA 4.0 or earlier.

      • setPostUpgradeStarted

        boolean setPostUpgradeStarted​(long startTimeMs)
        Persist the time when the post-upgrade starts or 0L when it is no longer running.
        Parameters:
        startTimeMs - time
        Returns:
        bool

      • isLesserThan

        boolean isLesserThan​(String first,
                     String second)
        Takes two versions and compares the first and the second versions to each other Compares the max amount of numbers on both. So 6.1.2.3,6.1.2 will try to compare 4 numbers, adding a 0, i.e. 6.1.2.3,6.1.2.0
        Parameters:
        first - a version number
        second - a version number
        Returns:
        true of the first version is lower (1.0 < 2.0) than the second, false otherwise.
